images.copyright: Trees in Wychwood Forest near Chipping Norton, Oxfordshire, England (© Frederick Ardley/Getty Images)
images.title: Who's in this creepy copse?
images.caption: Wychwood Forest, Oxfordshire, England
images.desc: What better way to spend Halloween than with a ghostly apparition in a scary haunted forest? Today we've (ill-advisedly?) wandered into Wychwood, an English forest with more than its share of spooky backstory. Many people walking in these woods have reported unexplained phenomena, such as feeling a hand on their shoulder and turning to find…no one. Or hearing children wailing as they're driven through the forest in a ghostly horse-drawn carriage.
